As one who plays a LOT of Katarina, I can honestly say she does not need to be nerfed. Against a proper team comp, she is next to useless, as any form of CC will decimate her. A lot of her game however is dependent on her first skirmish. If she gets first or second blood, she is pretty much set up for a quick roam down bot, and thus she snowballs. However, if she falls early, then it is very hard to pick back up. She falls under the same category of champions as Yi, snowball early or useless late game. 
That being said, the 4.20 nerfs really hit her hard imo, hits her early game incredibly hard as there is now an extra reset needed for her ult.
